verses.verse: In the eighth <WH8066> month <WH2320>, in the second <WH8147> year <WH8141> of Darius <WH1867>, came the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> unto Z'kharyah-yahu <WH2148>, the son <WH1121> of Berechiah <WH1296>, the son <WH1121> of Iddo <WH5714> the prophet <WH5030>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,
The YY <WH3068> hath been sore <WH7110> displeased <WH7107> <WH8804> with your fathers <WH1>.

Therefore say <WH559> <WH8804> thou unto them, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>; Turn <WH7725> <WH8798> ye unto me, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>, and I will turn <WH7725> <WH8799> unto you, saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>.

Be ye not as your fathers <WH1>, unto whom the former <WH7223> prophets <WH5030> have cried <WH7121> <WH8804>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>; Turn <WH7725> <WH8798> ye now from your evil <WH7451> ways <WH1870>, and from your evil <WH7451> doings <WH4611>: but they did not hear <WH8085> <WH8804>, nor hearken <WH7181> <WH8689> unto me, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>.
Your fathers <WH1>, where are they? and the prophets <WH5030>, do they live <WH2421> <WH8799> for ever <WH5769> ?

But my words <WH1697> and my statutes <WH2706>, which I commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> my servants <WH5650> the prophets <WH5030>, did they not take hold <WH5381> <WH8689> of your fathers <WH1>? and they returned <WH7725> <WH8799> and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Like as the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635> thought <WH2161> <WH8804> to do <WH6213> <WH8800> unto us, according to our ways <WH1870>, and according to our doings <WH4611>, so hath he dealt <WH6213> <WH8804> with us.

Upon the four <WH702> and twentieth <WH6242> day <WH3117> of the eleventh <WH6249> <WH6240> month <WH2320>, which is the month <WH2320> Sebat <WH7627>, in the second <WH8147> year <WH8141> of Darius <WH1867>, came the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> unto Z'kharyah-yahu <WH2148>, the son <WH1121> of Berechiah <WH1296>, the son <WH1121> of Iddo <WH5714> the prophet <WH5030>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

I saw <WH7200> <WH8804> by night <WH3915>, and behold a man <WH376> riding <WH7392> <WH8802> upon a red <WH122> horse <WH5483>, and he stood <WH5975> <WH8802> among the myrtle trees <WH1918> that were in the bottom <WH4699>; and behind <WH310> him were there red <WH122> horses <WH5483>, speckled <WH8320>, and white <WH3836>.

Then said <WH559> <WH8799> I, O my lord <WH113>, what are these? And the angel <WH4397> that talked <WH1696> <WH8802> with me said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, I will shew <WH7200> <WH8686> thee what these be.

And the man <WH376> that stood <WH5975> <WH8802> among the myrtle trees <WH1918> answered <WH6030> <WH8799> and said <WH559> <WH8799>, These are they whom the YY <WH3068> hath sent <WH7971> <WH8804> to walk <WH1980> <WH8692> to and fro through the earth <WH776>.

And they answered <WH6030> <WH8799> the angel <WH4397> of the YY <WH3068> that stood <WH5975> <WH8802> among the myrtle trees <WH1918>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, We have walked to and fro <WH1980> <WH8694> through the earth <WH776>, and, behold, all the earth <WH776> sitteth still <WH3427> <WH8802>, and is at rest <WH8252> <WH8802>.

Then the angel <WH4397> of the YY <WH3068> answered <WH6030> <WH8799> and said <WH559> <WH8799>, O YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>, how long wilt thou not have mercy <WH7355> <WH8762> on Yerushalayim <WH3389> and on the cities <WH5892> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, against which thou hast had indignation <WH2194> <WH8804> these threescore and ten <WH7657> years <WH8141> ?
And the YY <WH3068> answered <WH6030> <WH8799> the angel <WH4397> that talked <WH1696> <WH8802> with me with good <WH2896> words <WH1697> and comfortable <WH5150> words <WH1697>.

So the angel <WH4397> that communed <WH1696> <WH8802> with me said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, Cry <WH7121> <WH8798> thou, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>; I am jealous <WH7065> <WH8765> for Yerushalayim <WH3389> and for TZiyon <WH6726> with a great <WH1419> jealousy <WH7068>.

And I am very <WH1419> sore <WH7110> displeased <WH7107> <WH8804> with the heathen <WH1471> that are at ease <WH7600>: for I was but a little <WH4592> displeased <WH7107> <WH8802>, and they helped <WH5826> <WH8804> forward the affliction <WH7451>.

Therefore thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>; I am returned <WH7725> <WH8804> to Yerushalayim <WH3389> with mercies <WH7356>: my house <WH1004> shall be built <WH1129> <WH8735> in it, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>, and a line <WH6957> <WH8675> <WH6961> shall be stretched forth <WH5186> <WH8735> upon Yerushalayim <WH3389>.

Cry <WH7121> <WH8798> yet, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>; My cities <WH5892> through prosperity <WH2896> shall yet be spread abroad <WH6327> <WH8799>; and the YY <WH3068> shall yet comfort <WH5162> <WH8765> TZiyon <WH6726>, and shall yet choose <WH977> <WH8804> Yerushalayim <WH3389>.
Then lifted I up <WH5375> <WH8799> mine eyes <WH5869>, and saw <WH7200> <WH8799>, and behold four <WH702> shofars <WH7161>.

And I said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the angel <WH4397> that talked <WH1696> <WH8802> with me, What be these? And he answered <WH559> <WH8799> me, These are the shofars <WH7161> which have scattered <WH2219> <WH8765> Y'hudah <WH3063>, Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and Yerushalayim <WH3389>.
And the YY <WH3068> shewed <WH7200> <WH8686> me four <WH702> carpenters <WH2796>.

Then said <WH559> <WH8799> I, What come <WH935> <WH8802> these to do <WH6213> <WH8800>? And he spake <WH559> <WH8799>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, These are the shofars <WH7161> which have scattered <WH2219> <WH8765> Y'hudah <WH3063>, so that <WH6310> no man <WH376> did lift up <WH5375> <WH8804> his head <WH7218>: but these are come <WH935> <WH8799> to fray <WH2729> <WH8687> them, to cast out <WH3034> <WH8763> the shofars <WH7161> of the goyim <WH1471>, which lifted up <WH5375> <WH8802> their shofar <WH7161> over the land <WH776> of Y'hudah <WH3063> to scatter <WH2219> <WH8763> it.
